meanings.definition: A building containing multiple separate theaters for showing films.
meanings.sent1: The multiplexes in our town show a variety of movies.
meanings.sent2: Let's go to the multiplexes this weekend to watch a new movie.
meanings.sent3: The multiplexes were so crowded that we had to wait in line for tickets.
meanings.sent4: The multiplexes stood tall like giants in the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The colorful lights of the multiplexes lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: A system that allows multiple signals to be transmitted simultaneously on a single communication channel.
meanings.sent1: The new multiplexes technology improved our internet speed.
meanings.sent2: The multiplexes helped us avoid signal interference during the broadcast.
meanings.sent3: I was amazed by how the multiplexes managed to handle so many signals at once.
meanings.sent4: The multiplexes of information flowed seamlessly through the network.
meanings.sent5: The multiplexes technology revolutionized the way we communicate.

meanings.definition: To combine several signals or data streams into one.
meanings.sent1: The device multiplexes different data streams for efficient transmission.
meanings.sent2: She multiplexes the audio and video signals to create a seamless presentation.
meanings.sent3: He multiplexes the ingredients to create a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The artist multiplexes colors to create a vibrant painting.
meanings.sent5: The engineer multiplexes the signals to optimize the system performance.
